alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Palm Beach County through 630 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Downtown West Palm Beach, or near Palm Beach, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Palm Beach Gardens, Lake Worth, Riviera Beach, Palm Beach, Palm Springs, North Palm Beach, Lantana, Lake Park, Cloud Lake, Palm Beach International Airport, Schall Circle, Port Of Palm Beach, Juno Ridge, Downtown West Palm Beach, Gun Club Estates, Lake Clarke Shores, Mangonia Park, Glen Ridge and Lakeside Green. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
